issue.title: [Website] Add how to install on Red Hat Enterprise Linux
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7909](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7909). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On the installation page for Arrow:
https://arrow.apache.org/install/

it says for **CentOS 6 and 7**:

```sh

sudo yum install -y https://apache.bintray.com/arrow/centos/$(cut -d: -f5 /etc/system-release-cpe)/apache-arrow-release-latest.rpm
```

That results in an invalid URL. The download is at:
https://apache.bintray.com/arrow/centos/7/apache-arrow-release-latest.rpm

not:
https://apache.bintray.com/arrow/centos/7.6/apache-arrow-release-latest.rpm
